title: The $100 Billion Megadeal Between OpenAI and Nvidia Is on Ice
title_zh: OpenAI 与 Nvidia 之间 1000 亿美元的巨额交易陷入僵局
summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has privately played down the likelihood the original deal will be finalized, although the two companies will continue to have a close collaboration.
summary_zh: 英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋私下淡化了最初交易敲定的可能性，尽管两家公司将继续密切合作。

title: Salesforce Army deal exposes $5.6 billion hype trap
title_zh: Salesforce Army 交易暴露 56 亿美元炒作陷阱
summary: Salesforce (CRM) is in the news again, clinching a huge government contract: the U.S. Army gave the cloud-based software company a $5.6 billion, 10-year contract deal to help with modernization and preparedness.
summary_zh: Salesforce (CRM) 再次成为新闻焦点，赢得了一份巨额政府合同：美国陆军向这家基于云的软件公司提供了一份价值 56 亿美元、为期 10 年的合同协议，以帮助其现代化和做好准备。

title: MS or JEF: Which Stock to Bet on Amid Surge in Deal-making and IPOs?
title_zh: MS 或 JEF：在交易和 IPO 激增的情况下押注哪只股票？
summary: Morgan Stanley and Jefferies are riding the rebound in deal-making, but diverge in growth paths, earnings power and investor favor. Which IB stock is a buy now?
summary_zh: 摩根士丹利和杰富瑞正在利用交易量的反弹，但在增长路径、盈利能力和投资者青睐方面存在分歧。现在值得买入哪些 IB 股票？

title: Software sector offers 'really interesting buying opportunities'
title_zh: 软件行业提供“非常有趣的购买机会”
summary: Software stocks, including Microsoft (MSFT), Salesforce (CRM), and ServiceNow (NOW), are getting slammed in Thursday trading amid pressure on the sector (IGV) from artificial intelligence (AI) disruption concerns.Wolfe Research managing director and head of software research A...
summary_zh: 由于人工智能（AI）颠覆担忧给该行业（IGV）带来压力，包括微软（MSFT）、Salesforce（CRM）和ServiceNow（NOW）在内的软件股在周四交易中遭受重挫。Wolfe Research董事总经理兼软件研究主管A...

title: Cisco’s Polish Solar Deal Adds New Dimension To ESG And Growth Story
title_zh: 思科的波兰太阳能交易为 ESG 和增长故事增添了新的维度
summary: Cisco Systems (NasdaqGS:CSCO) has entered a 15 year virtual power purchase agreement tied to four new solar projects in Poland. The deal supports additional renewable energy capacity in one of Europe’s more carbon intensive grids.
summary_zh: 思科系统公司（NasdaqGS：CSCO）已与波兰的四个新太阳能项目签订为期 15 年的虚拟电力购买协议。该协议支持欧洲碳密集度较高的电网之一增加可再生能源容量。
